text:
Request from Steve Loughram (steve_l@iseran.com), email to vhardy@apache.org
on March 22 2001:

One little side
task we are having to do on this nature is filter out some xlink references
for security reasons, depending on where the svg came from. Where in the
source do you think I should start in that (I could take the security
permissions tactic but I am not sure if it will be dynamic enough to do it
on a file by file basis without major rework)
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com

text: See the new UserAgent interface and the xdocs/security.xml documentation.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
